title: Salt, ca. 1810–20
provenance: cf 1986-61-152, ewer, attributed to Waterford, same cut pattern.
description: Round bowl with a pouring lip, cut with vertical pillar flutes alternating with small diamonds, 2 prismatic bands below, a short round foot, ground pontil mark bottom.

tombstone.epitaph:
Salt, ca. 1810–20.
ca. 1810–20. glass. Bequest of Walter Phelps Warren. 1986-61-239.
